price: 87. Naxariis maahee xagga Rabbigaa ah. Fadligiisu korkaaga (Nabiyow) waa mid aad u weyn.
arabic: إِلَّا رَحۡمَةٗ مِّن رَّبِّكَۚ إِنَّ فَضۡلَهُۥ كَانَ عَلَيۡكَ كَبِيرٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: illā raḥmatan min rabbika inna faḍlahu kāna ʿalayka kabīran
